get.description: Get Service Status, GetApplicableAddOnServices, GetPrepaidBlackberryServices, VerifyDuNumber
get.summary: All the resources in 'DESCRIPTION' have same basepath and verb, Queryparams are used to decide which resource gets executed

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id(for Get Service Status,Not Mandatory)

parameters.name: contract_id_pub
parameters.description: Contract Id Pub(for Get Service Status,Not Mandatory)

parameters.name: bscs_con_type
parameters.description: Bscs Con Type(for Get Service Status,Not Mandatory)

parameters.name: bypass_services_info
parameters.description: Bypass Services Information(for Get Service Status,Not Mandatory)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type should have applicableaddon as fixed content(for GetApplicableAddOnSevices), prepaidblackberry as fixed content(for Get PrepaidBlackBerryServies

parameters.name: msisdn
parameters.description: Msisdn(for Get PrepaidBlackBerryServies-Mandatory, VerifyDuNumber-Mandatory ,for Get Service Status-Not Mandatory

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action should have verifyDuNumber as fixed content(for VerifyDuNumber,Mandatory)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type mandatory for Create Mobile Activation,Create MNP Activation, Create MultiLine Mobile Activation

parameters.name: Account Code
parameters.description: Account Code mandatory for Create Mobile Activation,Create MNP Activation, Create MultiLine Mobile Activation

get.description: MNP Get Request Info and GET OMP Fulfillments
get.summary: Both the resources in 'DESCRIPTION' have same basepath and verb, Queryparams are used to decide which resource gets executed

schema.description: Response FOr Get OMP Fulfillment Request

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type mandatory for  Get OMP Fullfilment and MNP Get request info

parameters.name: account_code
parameters.description: Account Code for MNP Get Request Info ,Mandatory

parameters.name: Public Id
parameters.description: Public Id Mandatory for both MNP Get request info and Get OMP Fulfillments

put.summary: Set User Preferred Language by Msisdn

parameters.description: Customer Id Pub(For Get Customer Information),optional

parameters.name: bscs_con_type
parameters.description: Bscs Con Type(For Get Customer Information),optional

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Customer Id(Conditional Mandatory-Any one of Customer Id, Msisdn or Contract Id is required"

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id(Conditional Mandatory-Any one of Customer Id, Msisdn or Contract Id is required"

parameters.name: msisdn
parameters.description: Msisdn Number(Conditional Mandatory-Any one of Customer Id, Msisdn or Contract Id is required"
